name: Green and Black Batik Silk Scarf (8 x 54)
Erhu
description: Traditional Chinese string instrument with a beautiful tone, commonly used in Chinese orchestras and traditional music performances.

name: Traditional Muruku
description: Crunchy and savory traditional Indian-Malaysian snack made from rice flour

name: Red Batik Silk Scarf
description: Elegant red batik silk scarf featuring traditional Malaysian motifs. Hand-printed using traditional wax-resist dyeing technique.

name: Congkak Board Set
description: Traditional Malay counting game carved from solid wood. Complete set includes board and marble seeds.

name: Guzheng
description: Chinese plucked zither with 21 strings. Creates beautiful, flowing melodies characteristic of traditional Chinese music.

name: Kompang Drum
description: Traditional Malay hand drum used in weddings and cultural celebrations. Made with genuine goat skin.

name: Sape
description: Traditional Borneo lute instrument from the Orang Ulu people. Known for its soothing and mystical sound.

name: Kuih Bahulu
description: Light and fluffy Malaysian sponge cakes. Traditional festive treat with a subtle egg and vanilla flavor.

name: Dodol
description: Sweet and chewy Malaysian confection made from coconut milk, palm sugar, and rice flour. A festive favorite.

name: Sambal Ikan Bilis
description: Crispy anchovies cooked in spicy sambal sauce. Perfect accompaniment to nasi lemak.

name: Pewter Photo Frame
description: Handcrafted Malaysian pewter photo frame featuring traditional floral designs. Made with 95% tin.

name: Wayang Kulit Shadow Puppet
description: Traditional Javanese leather shadow puppet, hand-carved and painted. A unique piece of Southeast Asian art.

name: Dizi Bamboo Flute
description: Traditional Chinese transverse flute made from bamboo. Includes membrane and carrying case.
